snippet.title: Teaser Trailer | The Copperfield Departement | Top Secret Files
snippet.description: The Copperfield Department is a text-based puzzle game where players take over the role of a social media detective. As tasked by Big Business Inc., a company controlling the country, your job is to hunt for social media accounts that could prove harmful to their image. The next step is to expose the person hiding behind the account and holding them accountable. The game plays inside your office, which contains a computer used for gathering information and a pinboard to sort your thoughts.
